body.name: S SECRETLAND Queen Mattress, 12 Inch Cooling-Gel Memory Foam and Individually Pocket Innerspring Hybrid Mattress, Queen Bed Mattress in a Box, CertiPUR-US Certified,60”*80”, Medium Feel
features: Medium Firm Feel: S SECRETLAND Individually Wrapped Coils Innerspring Mattress is supported by hundreds of individual pocket springs, which is durable in use. Memory foam with 3D soft knitted fabric on the top increase its comfort level.

Support system: Tempered steel coil system provides powerful support to each part of your body (Feet, legs, hips, waist, shoulders, neck, head), catering your vertebral well. Tightly knit edges and reinforced foam maximize edge support.
High Permeability: 3D knitted dual-layer cover allows the mattress to breath freely, creating a dry, restful sleep. Also the Coil system permits additional airflow.
Certified Safe: Mattresses are certified by CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex Standard 100 without harmful substances like formaldehyde, mercury, and other heavy metals, ensuring a no concern sleep.

Please note: Due to the compression, rolling, and shipping process, please allow up to 72 hours for the mattress to fully expand. External factors, such as colder weather, may require a slightly longer duration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress and no sagging!
reviews.reviewText: I waited until I have slept on the mattress a couple of months, before doing my review. I was skeptical at first. The price made me think that the mattress would be a low quality. I WAS WRONG!! I love this mattress! I got the medium firm and 14" mattress, after reading some reviews. I do sleep in the same spot most nights. There has been no "nest built" in that spot. The mattress is firm, but not concrete firm. I sleep very well and comfortable. Also, I don't get hot. For reference, I am 5'8 and weigh 210lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it!
reviews.reviewText: I have to admit I was skeptical because the price was so low. This is the most comfortable mattress I have ever slept on! Absolutely amazing value and amazing product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big box mattress stores are a scam
reviews.reviewText: Quick review: didn’t smell, expanded fully in 24 hours, sleeps great, no noise.Long review: This is the cheapest queen mattress I could find on Amazon. I knew it was gonna be either really hit or miss but this thing is on the money for the price.I opened it up and let it inflate for about 2 days. It had a nice smell but you could only smell it if you put your nose up to it. No overwhelming pungent factory smell.The first night I slept on it, I woke up really refreshed. Mind you, I came from a mattress that’s about 25 years old and I was convinced I’d never find a mattress more comfortable than it. I sleep on my back, sides, stomach and I toss and turn. I’m 6’2” and 190 lbs and this thing has completely exceeded my expectations for what I paid. I put a cheap slat bed frame under it and a couple memory foam cooling pillows from Ross and i actually felt like I needed to turn the heat on in the middle of the night because the bed & pillows had stayed so cold.My only gripe is if you sit on the edge of the bed getting ready in the morning it does sink in. Otherwise, it’s very comfortable and stays nice and cool as I get hot very easily.9/10. I would recommend this mattress to any one not looking to pay for big name mattresses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Mattress
reviews.reviewText: I was scared to get a boxed hybris mattress from amazon but im so glad i did! the price was great for a king sized mattress and it is incredibly comfortable. I love how you dont sink in and you can actually move around comfotably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yeah it’s nice
reviews.reviewText: Alright, I’m 22, 5’6, and 140 on a bad day. I sleep like a goob, I’m not going to lie. I toss and turn all night, mostly a side and stomach sleeper, but I dabble in back sleeping in the wee hour before my alarm comes on. This is NOT a soft mattress. I have the 10 inch because I am nothing if not a bargain hunter, and honestly she’s not a cloud. She’s more like if you put a cloud over a nice bed of concrete. I reckon that means there’s a medium amount of give here. For side and stomach sleepers? Pretty chill, no complaints, I’m having a great time. It’s supportive and kind, but definitely more firm for these positions.Now for back sleepers? Lord have mercy, I WISH I was a back sleeper on this mattress. Now let’s be clear, I am a relatively small woman, so I can’t speak for those above my realm of weight and give, but I will say it is soft and firm in the right places all around my town. It has a wonderful give for the curve of my back while it also supports all my non-curved areas. 1000/10 recommend for my girlies that want a Goldilocks kind of fit for their back.Other important information:I let it fluff for 48 hours but it was pretty much done in 12. It does have an aroma of curated factory with a hint of chemicals upon opening, but the vacuum-sealed packaging is so cool it kind of makes up for the smell. Further, the smell went away fairly quickly. VERY soft to the touch in case you’re the variety of heathen that prefers to sleep without sheets, and most importantly it was super heavy to move around, so I’d recommend a trusted friend and confidant to lug this up your stairs. You could probably scoot it if you’re able-bodied and alone… in a single story house.All in all, it’s a pretty solid mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Way to soft
reviews.reviewText: You literally sink into this mattress. It's hard to move around in it because of how you sink into it. However, it is very comfortable. I would give it a 5 star if it was a little more firm. Very good quality. I would say that it is worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, pleasant surprise
reviews.reviewText: Due to some unforseen circumstanced I had to vacate my sleepnumber bed. I was just looking for a temporary but comfortable mattress. I LOVE this mattress. Incredibly comfortable fun to set up (it comes in a box and then BAM, BED).I was cautiously optimistic I let that bad boy do it's expansion and have not looked back. My husband even abandoned the sleep number bed. When our situation is fixed I plan to buy another one for the Master Bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but not great
reviews.reviewText: I recently ordered this mattress from Amazon as I was looking for a new mattress after I got rid of my old one. The nice thing about this mattress is that it delivers pretty quickly and it has a range of options for what size mattress you’re looking for. It’s also pretty comfortable but it is very basic. It does not come with a boxspring and it’s pretty flimsy therefore it’s kind of difficult to move around if you have to take it off the bed at any point. I personally would recommend getting a mattress topper to put on top of this because it’s kind of a thin mattress but it’s not entirely necessary. it also has a nice medium firmness to it to appease those who like a firm or a soft type bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The item is falling apart, and the quality is not top-notch, the springs actually gone down the quality is terrible im not happy with it at all
